statements: SELECT * FROM client_health_records WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, email FROM client_health_records WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM client_health_records WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM client_health_records WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM client_health_records WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT * FROM client_health_records WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, date_of_birth FROM client_health_records WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM client_health_records WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM client_health_records ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, email FROM client_health_records WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT client_id, client_name, age, health_condition FROM ClientHealthRecords;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentPlans;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM ClientHealthRecords WHERE age > 30;
SELECT treatment_description, treatment_status FROM TreatmentPlans WHERE client_id = 100;
SELECT therapist_notes FROM TreatmentPlans ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClientHealthRecords WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, health_condition FROM ClientHealthRecords WHERE age BETWEEN 40 AND 50;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM ClientHealthRecords WHERE health_condition LIKE 'Diabetes%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentPlans WHERE treatment_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY plan_id ASC;
SELECT client_id, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM ClientHealthRecords GROUP BY client_id HAVING AVG(age) > 50;
SELECT * FROM client_health_records WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM client_health_records WHERE birthdate >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT client_id, medical_condition FROM client_health_records WHERE medical_condition = 'Diabetes';
SELECT plan_id, start_date, end_date FROM treatment_plans WHERE therapy_type = 'Physical Therapy';
SELECT report_id, report_date, therapist_notes FROM progress_reports WHERE plan_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM client_health_records WHERE medical_condition = 'Diabetes';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM client_health_records WHERE birthdate <= '1990-01-01';
SELECT client_id, first_name, last_name, medical_condition FROM client_health_records ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT plan_id, therapy_type, start_date, end_date FROM treatment_plans WHERE therapy_type = 'Physical Therapy' AND start_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT pr.report_id, pr.report_date, pr.therapist_notes, tp.therapy_type FROM progress_reports pr INNER JOIN treatment_plans tp ON pr.plan_id = tp.plan_id WHERE tp.therapy_type = 'Mental Health' AND pr.report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM health_records;
SELECT name, date_of_birth, gender FROM health_records;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM health_records WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans ORDER BY plan_start_date DESC;
SELECT session_date, session_type, session_duration FROM sessions WHERE client_id = 2 AND plan_id = 1;
SELECT name, date_of_birth, gender, email, phone_number FROM health_records WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT plan_description, plan_start_date, plan_end_date FROM treatment_plans WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT report_date, report_text FROM progress_reports WHERE client_id = 3 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE client_id = 4 AND session_type = 'Physical Therapy';
SELECT client_id, plan_id, session_date, session_duration FROM sessions WHERE plan_id = 5 ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM client_health_records;
SELECT client_name, age, health_condition FROM client_health_records WHERE age > 30;
SELECT therapist_name, specialization FROM therapists ORDER BY therapist_name ASC;
SELECT appointment_date, status FROM appointments WHERE status = 'confirmed' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, health_condition, date_of_birth FROM client_health_records WHERE health_condition LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT client_name, age, health_condition FROM client_health_records WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY client_name ASC
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans WHERE start_date < '2022-01-15' ORDER BY plan_id DESC
SELECT therapist_name, specialization FROM therapists WHERE specialization = 'Counseling'
SELECT client_name, age, health_condition FROM client_health_records WHERE health_condition LIKE '%mental%' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE status = 'scheduled' AND appointment_date > '2022-02-01'
